name: Murshid Azher
title: Freelance designer and full-stack engineer from Sri Lanka.

experience.description: Developed and and maintained a SaaS product to make hiring process seamless for enterprises. Involved in every phase of the product development process from design analysis to ideation, wire-framing, system architecture, and full-stack development. Developed and maintained 'Resume extractor model' azure function app. Used Azure, C# services, Angular, and more...

Coordinated efficiently with a team of 12 members with skills in engineering and design while participating in peer design critiques to give and receive feedbacks. Building front-end and integrating design features which accelerate delivery time and decrease site crashes. Transitioned app from AngularJS front-end to React + Redux resulting in a cleaner design and faster execution.

education.description: Master of Science in Advance Software Engineering.
Bachelor of Computing in Software Engineering.

education.university: University of New York, Stony Brook
education.description: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science.
